summary: The module supplies lightweight mock datasets and a collection of helper routines used to verify the behavior of distributed data loading in the Accelerate framework. It includes utilities for constructing accelerators and data loaders, as well as a suite of test scenarios that examine batch size handling, even/uneven batch enforcement, stateful loader persistence, warning generation, and serialization of accelerator state.
